00011 //constructor:
00012 EIG::EIG(int M,int N){
00013    
00014    this->N = N;
00015    this->M = M;
00016    this->n_tp = M*(M - 1)/2;
00017 
00018 #ifdef PQ
00019 
00020    this->n = 2*n_tp;
00021 
00022    eig = new double * [2];
00023 
00024    eig[0] = new double [n];
00025    eig[1] = eig[0] + n_tp;
00026 
00027 #else
00028 
00029    this->n_ph = M*M;
00030 
00031    n = 2*n_tp + n_ph;
00032 
00033    eig = new double * [3];
00034 
00035    eig[0] = new double [n];
00036 
00037    for(int i = 1;i < 3;++i)
00038       eig[i] = eig[i - 1] + n_tp;
00039 
00040 #endif
00041 
00042 }

00074

00076

00081 //constructor met initialisatie door SUP matrix:
00082 EIG::EIG(SUP &SZ){
00083 
00084    this->N = SZ.gN();
00085    this->M = SZ.gM();
00086    this->n_tp = SZ.gn_tp();
00087 
00088 #ifdef PQ
00089 
00090    this->n = 2*n_tp;
00091 
00092    eig = new double * [2];
00093 
00094    eig[0] = new double [n];
00095    eig[1] = eig[0] + n_tp;
00096 
00097 #else
00098 
00099    this->n_ph = SZ.gn_ph();
00100    this->n = 2*n_tp + n_ph;
00101 
00102    eig = new double * [3];
00103 
00104    eig[0] = new double [n];
00105 
00106    eig[1] = eig[0] + n_tp;
00107    eig[2] = eig[1] + n_tp;
00108 
00109 #endif
00110 
00111    //dit vernietigd de originele matrix!
00112    for(int i = 0;i < 2;++i)
00113       SZ.tpm(i).diagonalize(eig[i]);
00114 
00115 #ifndef PQ
00116 
00117    SZ.phm().diagonalize(eig[2]);
00118 
00119 #endif
00120 
00121 }

00211 double EIG::lsfunc(double alpha){
00212 
00213    double ward = 0.0;
00214 
00215    for(int i = 0;i < n_tp;++i)
00216       ward += eig[0][i]/(1.0 + alpha*eig[0][i]);
00217 
00218    for(int i = 0;i < n_tp;++i)
00219       ward += eig[1][i]/(1.0 + alpha*eig[1][i]);
00220 
00221 #ifndef PQ
00222 
00223    for(int i = 0;i < n_ph;++i)
00224       ward += eig[2][i]/(1.0 + alpha*eig[2][i]);
00225 
00226 #endif
00227 
00228    return ward;
00229 
00230 }

00232 double EIG::min(){
00233 
00234    double ward;
00235 
00236    if(eig[0][0] < eig[1][0])
00237       ward = eig[0][0];
00238    else
00239       ward = eig[1][0];
00240 
00241 #ifndef PQ
00242 
00243    if(ward > eig[2][0])
00244       ward = eig[2][0];
00245 
00246 #endif
00247 
00248    return ward;
00249 
00250 }
